body_html:
Just a quick update. We won't continue this. We did some internal benchmark and in some cases, it was good. But in other cases, it was way too slow. We didn't investigate why, but as there is a PR for checkpointing, we won't continue this.

Note, the NVLINK to the CPU is ~5x faster then PCI-E 3x16.
